channel.title: Creating a teleporting timer?
channel.description: Hi, I recently did the Lunar Interface tut and now I'm working on making the spells work. I want players to only be able to use the Home teleport every 30 minutes. Can anyone help me create a teleporting timer? And I want it to save how long the player has on the timer if he logs out. thanks in advance
